com.poesys.db.dao.query

Class QueryCount<P extends IDbDto>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.db.dao.query.QueryCount<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the class for the parameter DTO
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IQueryCount<P>

    public class QueryCount<P extends IDbDto>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQueryCount<P>
    An implementation of the IQueryCount interface that performs the basic count query given a parameter data transfer object (DTO) of type P
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller
    See Also:
    IParameterizedCountSql

    • Method Detail

      • queryCount

        public java.math.BigInteger queryCount(P parameters,
                              java.lang.String subsystem)
        Description copied from interface: IQueryCount
        Query a count of some kind from the database.
        Specified by:
        queryCount in interface IQueryCount<P extends IDbDto>
        Parameters:
        parameters - a DTO that contains any parameters to the query
        subsystem - the subsystem that contains the DTO * @return a BigInteger count
        Returns:
        the count as a large integer

      • getRunnable

        private java.lang.Runnable getRunnable(P parameters)
        Create a Runnable query object that runs the count query. The run method runs the query and stores the count result in the static count variable. The method that runs the Runnable must be reentrant.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters object setting up the count
        Returns:
        the Runnable query object
